item.title: Trump demands Supreme Court step in after federal judges block his agenda: 'These people are Lunatics'
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court needs to step in to rein in federal judges after a series of setbacks, President Donald Trump said in a social media post.

item.title: LA Mayor Bass' former rival reveals why he is opposed to her recall campaign
item.description: Former Los Angeles mayoral candidate Rick Caruso is not backing the recall effort against his former opponent, Democratic Mayor Karen Bass.
